abstract: Chinese rights activist Xu Zhiyong, who was detained in July, appears in video shot from behind bars, urging citizens to sand up against government and turn rights into reality; unusual act of defiance is available for viewing on number of Web sites after being disseminated by his supporters.

byline.original: By JANE PERLEZ and CHRIS BUCKLEY
byline.contributor: Jane Perlez reported from Beijing, and Chris Buckley from Hong Kong.
